title: Abhises Abhiman: 50,800 trainee graduates recruit to government sector
content: By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva The national function ‘Abhises Abhiman’ to present letters of appointment to trainee graduates who were recruited to government service in 2012 was held under the patronage of the President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Sugathadasa Stadium this morning on 12 January….
